name: Simple Zippyshare Embed
author: Adam Stachowicz

sections.description:
NOTE: Zippyshare was shut down in March 2023. This plugin will not be working anymore.

This plugin converts all Zippyshare links in your WordPress content into Zippyshare player. It’s very simple. You can pick your colors in plugin settings page too ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-zippyshare-embed folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to plugin settings page and choose your colors and width ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
How can I change the download button?

Just put your download_button.png to the images folder and replace it
sections.changelog:
1.7

  • You can now change autoplay setting
  • Plugin is now little bit faster
  • Small fix to preg_match_all()
  • Better security
  • Removed duplicated required HTML tag in options
  • Formatting
  • Updated polish translation
  • Tested up to 4.6

1.6

  • Center download image
  • Formatting
  • Tested up to 4.3.1

1.5

  • Fixed preg_match_all() function to properly replace all ZippyShare link types
  • Tested up to 4.2.2

1.4.2

  • Tested up to 4.1

1.4.1

  • Tested up to 4.0 RC1

1.4

  • Added avatar to widget
  • Tested up to 4.0-beta2

1.3

  • Added widget – shows your Zippyshare stats and display name
  • Updated polish translation

1.2

  • Added download button – you can change it in images folder
  • Updated polish translation

1.1

  • Prepare for translations
  • Added pot file in languages folder
  • Polish translation by me

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Replace all Zippyshare links to embed media.
description:
NOTE: Zippyshare was shut down in March 2023. This plugin will not be working anymore.

This plugin converts all Zippyshare links in your WordPress content into Zippyshare player. It’s very simple. You can pick your colors in plugin settings page too ðŸ™‚

upgrade_notice.1.5: Now properly shows embeds for all link types!
upgrade_notice.1.3: Added widget - shows your Zippyshare stats and display name
upgrade_notice.1.2: Added download button - you can change it in images folder
upgrade_notice.1.0: This is the first version of plugin.

screenshots.caption: You must only put some Zippyshare links to your Wordpress content
